EmailTemplate.name: Payment Request Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} has been Sent Back.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PaymentRequest__c.Applicant__c}, This email is to notify you that, the Payment Request #{!PaymentRequest__c.Name} for the Grant #{!PaymentRequest__c.Grant__c} has been Rejected with following comments:
"{!ApprovalRequest.Comments}"
Payment Request Details:
Award: #{!PaymentRequest__c.Award__c}
Kindly login to the UtahGrants Systems to revise the Payment Request.
Sincerely,
UtahGrants Support Team
